verses.roman:
miśra kahe, "kauḍi chāḍibā,--nahe prabhura mane
kauḍi chāḍile prabhu kadācit duḥkha māne"

synonyms: miśra kahe—Kāśī Miśra said; kauḍi chāḍibā—you will excuse all dues; nahe—is not; prabhura mane—the thought of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kauḍi chāḍile—if you excuse all the dues; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kadācit—certainly; duḥkha māne—will be sorry.
translation: Kāśī Miśra said, "Excusing Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka of all his debts will not make the Lord happy, for that is not His intention."
